summary.title: StellarPay Digital Banking Threat Model (PayPal-Based)
summary.description: StellarPay Digital Banking is a web-based digital payment platform, modeled after PayPal, enabling users to create accounts, link bank cards, send/receive money, pay for goods/services, and manage transactions in real time. It handles sensitive data including personal identification details, bank account information, transaction logs, and API communications with payment gateways, requiring robust security measures
